duration_in_months: This will be a 2-year contract with an option to extend for one more year.

full_summary:
### Procurement Details

#### Tender Title
TBIPS Application Services (SPICT Services d'application)

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01010972

#### Solicitation Number
1000413293

#### Publication Date
October 24, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
November 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

#### Amendment Number
1

#### Amendment Date
November 01, 2022

#### Trade Agreements
The tender is governed by the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Goods and Services Classification
The tender is classified under the following codes:

* D302A: Informatics Professional Services

#### Region of Opportunity
The tender is open to all regions in Canada.

#### Region of Delivery
The contract will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Canada Border Services Agency.

#### Contact Information
For further information about the tender, please contact:

* Cloutier, Yves
* CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents
To access the tender documents, please visit:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/302757d460362d39351e9e800db19c3a/1000413293_-_npp_en.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/2fd0c924eb18d0287bf477da04e0fa9e/1000413293_-_npp_en_-_amd_001.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/097e4a2de89bad94e303406abbd37f
